refnamediv.refpurpose: check Amanda database for tape consistency

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Amcheckdb verifies that every tape mentioned in the Amanda database is still valid in the &tapelist;.

See the
man page for more details about Amanda.

refsect1.title: EXAMPLE
refsect1.para: This shows tape DMP014 is still listed in the database but is no longer listed in the &tapelist;:
refsect1.programlisting: # amcheckdb daily Tape DMP014 missing in /usr/local/etc/amanda//daily/tapelist Ready.
